trans-unit.source: Used internally as the class that represents metadata about an individual configuration property.
<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> is used to describe settings properties of a class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> é usado para descrever as propriedades de configurações de uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>.

trans-unit.source: The Settings API allows a collection of settings properties to be grouped into a common language runtime class.
trans-unit.target: A API de configurações permite que uma coleção de propriedades de configurações sejam agrupados em uma classe do common language runtime.

trans-unit.source: When persisting settings, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> base class asks for a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objects, grouped in a collection of type <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a persistência de configurações, o <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> solicita que a classe base para uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objetos, agrupados em uma coleção do tipo <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection>.

trans-unit.source: It does this by calling its own Properties member.
trans-unit.target: Ele faz isso chamando seu próprio membro de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Inherited classes should return a collection of properties to persist.
trans-unit.target: Classes herdadas devem retornar uma coleção de propriedades a serem mantidas.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> object includes metadata about the property, including the following:
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objeto inclui metadados sobre a propriedade, incluindo o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: Name.
trans-unit.target: Nome.

trans-unit.source: Default value.
trans-unit.target: Valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: Property type.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Serialization method.
trans-unit.target: Método de serialização.

trans-unit.source: Provider to use for persistence.
trans-unit.target: Provedor a ser usado para persistência.

trans-unit.source: Other arbitrary attributes that are context and provider specific.
trans-unit.target: Outros atributos arbitrários que são específicas do provedor e contexto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> class.
Specifies a copy of an existing <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> class, based on the supplied parameter.
Specifies the name of an existing <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> class.
based on the supplied parameter.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
The type of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider" /> object to use for persistence.
A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object is read-only.
The default value of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs" /> object.
This object is an enumeration used to set the serialization scheme for storing application settings.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary" /> object.
A Boolean value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized.
A Boolean value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> class based on the supplied parameters.
Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary" /> object containing the attributes of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of attributes used to describe a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de atributos usados para descrever um <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default value of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
An object containing the default value of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém o valor padrão de <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying whether a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> object is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" /> for somente leitura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Name%2A> cannot be an empty string or `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Name%2A> não pode ser uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ou `null`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> does not exist in the data provider, nothing can be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> não existe no provedor de dados, nada pode ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
The type for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs> object is an enumeration used as the serialization scheme to store application settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs> objeto é uma enumeração usada como o esquema de serialização para armazenar configurações de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o erro será gerado quando a propriedade é desserializada com êxito; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o erro será gerado quando a propriedade é serializada com êxito; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
